show_name: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K. (TV 2)
plot: Saiki Kusuo continues to try to live an ordinary life as a student at PK High School while hiding his psychic powers from his ridiculous classmates.
opening_theme: "Psilent Prisoner" (Ψレントプリズナー) by Saikikku Lover
"Oteage Psychics" (お手上げサイキクス; Psychics Who Have Given Up Hope) by Shiggy Jr.
